context: A framework was developed in <a1_0><b3_0><b5_0>1967<b5_0/><b3_0/><a1_0/> by <a0_0><b4_0><b6_0>Heinz Kloss<b6_0/><b4_0/><a0_0/>, abstand and ausbau languages, to <b7_0>describe speech communities<b7_0/>, that while unified <a2_0>politically and/or culturally<a2_0/>, include multiple dialects which though closely related genetically may be divergent to the point of inter-dialect unintelligibility.
